backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing storage mixins, authorization, and data models for jobs, contacts, blogs, testimonials, users, and service pricing with CRUD logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components for contact and social link updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text summaries of major frontend files describing responsibilities for hooks, components, constants, and SEO utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing primary site routes with change frequencies and priorities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuration using TanStack Router with lazy-loaded pages and layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Admin route guard enforcing authentication and admin role before granting access to dashboard pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Displays a job listing card with key details and buttons to apply or download the notification PDF.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets document title, meta description, and injects LocalBusiness JSON-LD schema into the page.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Renders a contact form with validation and submission plus contact info cards.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Homepage hero with service highlights and buttons to scroll, navigate to jobs, or open WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/site/PortfolioSe: Shows portfolio items organized in tabbed sections for designs, resumes, and projects.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Displays service categories with pricing fetched from API and WhatsApp order links.
Footer with business description, social links, and contact details including phone, WhatsApp, and email.
Responsive header with navigation links, mobile drawer, and login button.
Main site layout including header, footer, outlet, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/site/Testimonial: Fetches and displays testimonials in a carousel with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/site/WhatsAppFlo: Floating WhatsApp contact button linking to primary number.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Centralized contact info including WhatsApp numbers, email, channels, and location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating jobs, categories, user roles, blogs, testimonials, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, theming, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBlogPage.t: Admin interface for creating, editing, deleting, and publishing blog posts using dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page for enabling or disabling job categories using toggles and category state data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactsPa: Admin view of contact form submissions with the ability to delete entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard linking to all management sections such as jobs, categories, pricing, testimonials, contacts, and blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminJobsPage.t: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting job posts with PDF upload and apply link validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminServicePri: Admin page to manage service pricing entries, supporting add, edit, and delete operations via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTestimonia: Admin UI for managing testimonials, allowing creation, editing, visibility toggling, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a list of published blog posts with loading state, SEO, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with SEO metadata, handling loading, not-found states, and navigation back to the blog list.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with SEO metadata and multiple site sections including hero, services, portfolio, testimonials, and contact.
frontend/src/pages/JobsPage.tsx: Lists government job posts with search, category filtering, pagination, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/utils/officialDomainValidat: Validates apply URLs for HTTPS and official government domain patterns, returning warnings when invalid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project version, goals, architecture notes, constraints, and existing feature list for building a responsive website with services and a jobs portal. Includes known limitations and high-level functional requirements.
